comments:
Repro:

1) Open Database Explorer.
2) Expand plus sign in front of Connections node.
3) Select Connections node.
4) The following error is posted to the Error Log view:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.navigator 4 0 2006-04-06 17:03:13.264
!MESSAGE Could not acquire children from extension: org.eclipse.wst.rdb.server.ui.DatabaseExplorerContent
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.rdb.server.internal.ui.explorer.ServerExplorerViewer.getParent(ServerExplorerViewer.java:115)
	at org.eclipse.wst.rdb.server.internal.ui.explorer.providers.content.impl.ServerExplorerContentProviderNav.getParent(ServerExplorerContentProviderNav.java:230)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.navigator.extensions.SafeDelegateTreeContentProvider.getParent(SafeDelegateTreeContentProvider.java:85)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.navigator.NavigatorContentServiceContentProvider.getParent(NavigatorContentServiceContentProvider.java:437)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.navigator.SaveablesSourceHelper.getActiveSaveables(SaveablesSourceHelper.java:142)
	at org.eclipse.ui.navigator.CommonNavigator.getActiveSaveables(CommonNavigator.java:559)
With the latest Eclipse base(eclipse-SDK-3.2M6), the error is now posted to the Error Log every time a node is selected in the Database Explorer.

Created an attachment (id=38607)
Patch to address Database Explorer issues
Applied patch to WTP 1.5 (HEAD) stream on April 14th, 2006.
